Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.143.cipherString: Engineers did not discover insulation: they copied it from these old soldiers of the prairie war.
CIPHER.143.question: A quote by Aldo Leopold has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.143.author: Aldo Leopold

CIPHER.125.cipherString: Gratitude is merely the secret hope of further favors.
CIPHER.125.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Francois de La Rochefoucauld using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.125.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

CIPHER.124.cipherString: If thee nacients left us idesa, ot oru credit eb it spoken, wee omderns are building houses for them.
CIPHER.124.question: A friend of yours tried to encode a quote by A. B. Alcott as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  Unfortunately for you they are both a terrible speller and typist.  What did they encode?
CIPHER.124.author: A. B. Alcott

CIPHER.121.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 6 21443 98675. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.141.cipherString: We tend to think of technological progress as an ever accelerating affair, but it just isn't so.
CIPHER.141.question: A quote by William J. Bernstein has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told that the second word decodes to TEND
CIPHER.141.author: William J. Bernstein

CIPHER.136.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 679 8039 4251. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.132.cipherString: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
CIPHER.132.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by John Leonard using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with ITTAK
CIPHER.132.author: John Leonard

CIPHER.137.cipherString: Knowledge was like candy: you never turned it down, especially if you didn't have to work too hard to get it.
CIPHER.137.question: A quote by Robert Liparulo has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.137.author: Robert Liparulo

CIPHER.128.cipherString: Surely no child, and few adults, have ever watched a bird in flight without envy.
CIPHER.128.question: The following quote by Isaac Asimov needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of CLIMB and polybius key of TRIUMPHAL.
CIPHER.128.author: Isaac Asimov

CIPHER.139.cipherString: Sometimes it's important to wake up and stop dreaming. When a really great dream shows up, grab it
CIPHER.139.question: A quote by Larry Page has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.139.author: Larry Page

CIPHER.130.cipherString: My boat sails freely, both with wind and stream.
CIPHER.130.question: The following symbols encode a quote by William Shakespeare using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.130.author: William Shakespeare

CIPHER.129.cipherString: There is only one way to success, wealth and achievement and that is through a lot of hard work.
CIPHER.129.question: A quote by John Patrick Hickey has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K2 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.129.author: John Patrick Hickey

CIPHER.127.cipherString: Never act in breach of trust.
CIPHER.127.question: Decode the following quote by Basava which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of BOAR.
CIPHER.127.author: Basava

CIPHER.131.cipherString: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
CIPHER.131.question: A quote by Denis Waitley has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.131.author: Denis Waitley

CIPHER.138.cipherString: When the youth of America gets together, amazing things happen.
CIPHER.138.question: A quote by Tom Ford has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with WHENT.
CIPHER.138.author: Tom Ford

CIPHER.126.cipherString: The progressive development of man is vitally dependent on invention.
CIPHER.126.question: The following quote by Nikola Tesla needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of EQUAL and polybius key of UNSCRIPTED.
CIPHER.126.author: Nikola Tesla

CIPHER.123.cipherString: Everything is a subject on which there is not much to be said.
CIPHER.123.question: A quote by C. S. Lewis has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has WHICHT somewhere in it.
CIPHER.123.author: C. S. Lewis

CIPHER.133.cipherString: Nothing is less in our power than the heart, and, far from commanding it, we are forced to obey it.
CIPHER.133.question: A quote by Rousseau has been encoded using the K3 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K3 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.133.author: Rousseau

CIPHER.140.cipherString: We would like to live as we once lived, but history will not permit it.
CIPHER.140.question: The following quote by John F. Kennedy needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of SHINE
CIPHER.140.author: John F. Kennedy

CIPHER.134.question: Decode the following French Proverb which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of TOUT.
CIPHER.134.author: French Proverb

CIPHER.135.cipherString: La expresión por sí sola puede investir a la belleza con un dominio supremo y duradero sobre el ojo.
CIPHER.135.question: A quote by Fuseli in Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.135.author: Fuseli
CIPHER.135.translation: Expression alone can invest beauty with supreme and lasting command over the eye.

CIPHER.142.cipherString: For that which is without a beginning, a final cause need not be sought.
CIPHER.142.question: A quote by Maimonides has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has A FINAL somewhere in it.
CIPHER.142.author: Maimonides

CIPHER.122.cipherString: Life is a compromise of what your ego wants to do, what experience tells you to do, and what your nerves let you do.
CIPHER.122.question: A quote by Walter Bagehot has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K1 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.122.author: Walter Bagehot
